ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: Magic resistance is innate in some creaturs like griffawns in N. karanas and if you go to S. Karanas a same lv elephant will not resist a one spell i like them
ygData.messageBody:
Magic resistance is innate in some creaturs like griffawns in N. karanas and if
you go to S. Karanas a same lv elephant will not resist a one spell i like them
so much so much. Ahh root and nuke and nuke and root and nuke and RUN and stomp
and stomp


At 09.14 26/05/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
> At 18th level you should have been hitting anything in Befallen for full
> damage. I'm 20th now, and NOTHING in there cons above blue to me. I've also
> noticed that spells get resisted depending on the mob. Dorn for example
> conned an easy blue and yet all my spells were doing one third damage or so.
> So, I believe magic resistance is innate in certain creatures and not in some
> others.
>
> Zalbar
> 20th Wizard
> Solusek Ro
>
